channel.title: 8080 Simulator on The IMSAI Gang
channel.description: Recent content in 8080 Simulator on The IMSAI Gang

item.title: GWEMU - Intel 8080 Emulator
item.description: Why write another emulator If you look around for intel 8080 (which is what the system is based on) emulator on the internet today, all you will find is emulators that are tailored towards running games (namely space invadors); however, we wanted to use an emulator to 1) test our compiler 2) help debugging our assembly software when debugging using the real machine could be tricky. Introducing the GWEMU GitHub Project URL
